summary: Preview- Avengers: Endgame (Bluray)
title: Preview- Avengers: Endgame (Bluray)
body:
Preview- Avengers: Endgame (Bluray)

The grave course of events set in motion by Thanos that wiped out half the universe and fractured the Avengers ranks compels the remaining Avengers to take one final stand in Marvel Studios’ grand conclusion to twenty-two films, “Avengers: Endgame.”

Bonus Features

  • Audio Commentary
  • Play Movie with Intro by Directors Joe and Anthony…

me: I'm over Endgame now. I have made my peace. I am no longer salty.
also me: Let me add several hundred words worth of tags to...
body:
me: I'm over Endgame now. I have made my peace. I am no longer salty.
also me: Let me add several hundred words worth of tags to this post about Endgame to convey my undying hatred for their stupid fucking ideas.

summary: Disney Announces Avengers: Endgame Home Video Dates
title: Disney Announces Avengers: Endgame Home Video Dates
body:
Disney Announces Avengers: Endgame Home Video Dates

While Disney prepares to package all things Marvel Studios into its Disney+ streaming service, individual home video sales still matter. Consequently, the company’s home video division announced the release dates for the digital and disc releases of Avengers: Endgame Wednesday morning.

According to EW, the film will hit digital platforms on July 30 while physical copies arrive on August 13th.…

Make it a GREAT day!

summary: Marvel Studios to Release AVENGERS: ENDGAME on Digital 7/30 and on Blu-ray 8/13
title: Marvel Studios to Release AVENGERS: ENDGAME on Digital 7/30 and on Blu-ray 8/13
body:
Marvel Studios to Release AVENGERS: ENDGAME on Digital 7/30 and on Blu-ray 8/13

Ahead of the Marvel Studios’ Avengers: Endgame Bring Back event this weekend, Marvel is announcing when Avengers: Endgame will be arriving both digitally and on Blu-ray. The release will be on July 30th digitally and August 13th for the Blu-ray.

Included with the digital release will be some extras that include a remembrance of Stan Lee, a look at Steve Rogers and Peggy Carter’s love story, a…

title: YA HAY FECHA DE LANZAMIENTO PARA BLU-RAY Y DVD DE AVENGERS: ENDGAME #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos #Noticias #Marvel #AVENGERSENDGAME
body:
Si aún no saben si la película de Avengers: Endgame se va a reestrenar en su ciudad durante los próximos días, por lo menos ya sabrán cuándo la podrán ver en sus hogares, ya que se ha revelado cuándo estará disponible en formatos digitales, DVD y Blu-ray. Además, ya se sabe en qué consistirá el material adicional que incluirán.

Marvel Studios dio a conocer que la película más taquillera del…

summary: La versione con scene aggiuntive di Avengers: Endgame anche in Italia
title: La versione con scene aggiuntive di Avengers: Endgame anche in Italia
body:
La versione con scene aggiuntive di Avengers: Endgame anche in Italia

I fan Marvel italiani sono stati accontentati. La versione con scene aggiuntive di Avengers: Endgame approderà anche in Italia il prossimo 4 luglio.

In uscita nelle sale Usa il prossimo 28 giugno, la versione esclusiva di Avengers: Endgamearriva anche in Italia – in alcune sale selezionate – il 4 luglio. La decisione è stata confermata nel primissimo pomeriggio odierno attraverso un breve…

title: Zendaya On How MJ Will Be Affected By Life Post-Snap In Spider-Man: Far From Home
body:
Credit: Marvel Studios

Spider-Man: Far From Home will premiere in a couple weeks. We get to see some of the fallout in the lives of formerly “Snapped” individuals who were returned during Avengers: Endgame.

One of those individuals? MJ (Zendaya).

In an interview with Fandango, the Spider-Man star shared about how life has changed for her and the others who were returned.

summary: Tom Hiddleston promises 'a departure' in the new Loki series
title: Tom Hiddleston promises 'a departure' in the new Loki series
body:
Tom Hiddleston clearly has to keep shtum about the new Loki TV series for Disney, but the British star has let a little slip.

He will reprise the role of the anti-hero trickster of Asgard for the Mouse House’s new streaming channel, Disney+.

Speaking to The Hollywood Reporter at the Shanghai International Film Festival, he said: “All I can tell you is that it is called Loki. It is a new departure… but I can’t explain why.”

Read more: Marvel ‘fan’ recuts Endgame without the female characters

Now, we may be reading too much into this, but his use of the word ‘departure’, with its travel connotations, could be telling here.

Rumours among MCU fans is that the show will find Loki using the Tesseract he absconded with in Avengers: Endgame, when Tony Stark and Captain America’s initial plan goes awry.

This means he could be bouncing around all manner of time zones, like a latter day Quantum Leap, and a recent snap from the series would back this up.

At a Disney investors presentation a few weeks back, some of the first visuals were shown to shareholders, one being for Loki.

It saw Hiddleston in what appeared to be New York, with Jaws appearing at a cinema in the background, which would put the action round 1975.

But with the actor remaining tight-lipped, we may not know for some time whether this is the premise for the show or not.

Read more: Endgame re-release confirmed for UK

Either way, Loki will join a number of new Marvel projects set to premiere on Disney+.

Scarlett Witch and Vision will be getting their own series, as will Falcon and the Winter Soldier, while it sounds like Jeremy Renner's Hawkeye will appearing in a show which sounds likely to set up his protege Kate Bishop as the Avengers’ new archer.

Disney+ will launch in America on November 12, but a UK launch date still remains TBC.

reblog.comment:
Tom Hiddleston clearly has to keep shtum about the new Loki TV series for Disney, but the British star has let a little slip.

He will reprise the role of the anti-hero trickster of Asgard for the Mouse House’s new streaming channel, Disney+.

Speaking to The Hollywood Reporter at the Shanghai International Film Festival, he said: “All I can tell you is that it is called Loki. It is a new departure… but I can’t explain why.”

Read more: Marvel ‘fan’ recuts Endgame without the female characters

Now, we may be reading too much into this, but his use of the word ‘departure’, with its travel connotations, could be telling here.

Rumours among MCU fans is that the show will find Loki using the Tesseract he absconded with in Avengers: Endgame, when Tony Stark and Captain America’s initial plan goes awry.

This means he could be bouncing around all manner of time zones, like a latter day Quantum Leap, and a recent snap from the series would back this up.

Disney+ will launch in America on November 12, but a UK launch date still remains TBC.

tags: SORRY IM JUST FILLED WITH SO MUCH SADNESS AND PAIN
summary:
it's like i have to reach through universes to get to you.
but i'd do it.
because i know that you would, too.
you've done it...
body:
it’s like i have to reach through universes to get to you.

but i’d do it.

because i know that you would, too.

you’ve done it before.

but this time i couldn’t- wouldn’t

because you can be happy

and i can too.
